high_descs: pick up the spray bottle from the counter of the tub
take the bottle to the toilet
put the bottle on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: take the spray bottle from the bathtub to the toilet

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the right side of the bathtub
Pick up the purple spray bottle that is sitting to the right of the bathtub
Turn around and make a left immediately after the toilet turn a quick left to face the side of the toilet
Place the purple spray bottle on the toilet in front of the soap bottle
anns.task_desc: Place a spray bottle on the back of a toilet

high_descs: Turn around and cross the room to face the tub.
Pick the purple bottle up from behind the tub.
Turn around and go left to face the toilet from the right side.
Put the bottle down on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a bottle on the back of a toilet.
